attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to make a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a counter petition to: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171928/

"Prevent Donald Trump from making a State Visit to the United Kingdom.

Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, but he should not be invited to make an official State Visit because it would cause embarrassment to Her Majesty the Queen."
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, and should be invited to make an official State Visit because keeping communication lines open is crucial to maintaining influence, regardless of objections to his recent controversial executive orders
